body.header: Read the passage on the left and complete the table on the right. Write NO MORE THAN THREE WORDS from the passage or in the Format section, the letters (I) - Individuals, (T) - Team or (G) - Whole Group.
body.section:
Infinity MarblesCountry: AustraliaPlayers: 1. childrenEquipment: marblesFormat: I
Salan Lanai Country: New Guinea Players: 2. Equipment: 3. Format: G
PinCountry: 4. Players: Indian childrenEquipment: 5. Format: 6.
MukCountry: Canada Players: 7. children and their familiesEquipment: noneFormat: 8.
Kite-flyingCountry: MalaysiaPlayers: 9. Equipment: 10. kites with bamboo framesFormat: I

section.p: Questions 1-10 - Table completionDon't spend too much time on this exercise. Examine the whole table before you begin reading so that you know how it is organised. Look carefully at the column headings and at the information that has already been filled in. Decide what kind of information is required in each gap and then scan the text quickly to find the answers. You will find the information you need in the same order as the questions, so follow the question numbers.
Questions 1, 2, 7 and 9Do you think numbers are missing from these questions, or some other kind of information?
Question 4Be careful here! You might think that you can get this answer by using this information in the 'Players' point, but in fact you'll have to read the text to find it.
Questions 6 and 8Make sure you follow the instructions for these two questions.
